column4: hello. I've got an old pentium 3, 450mhz computer with 384 mb of ram upon which I must rely due to a laptop death. I'm currently running an old (5.04) distro of ubuntu and I'm curious how I'd fare with a more current version.
it uses XFCE as it's desktop environment, i don't know what the default window manager is for XFCE off the top of my head, google can probably tell you
